short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track prices on StubHub and get notified when they reach your target price.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows users to set price alerts for any events on StubHub. This ensures you are the first to know when prices drop. 

Users are notified via a notification on the extension's icon and can optionally add their email address to be notified, as well.

Please note that the extension will only update if Chrome is open and running. I will be working on the new version which will work with Chrome shut down :)
